vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Πάταρα, -ων, τὰ
Patara, a maritime city of Lycia: Act.21:1.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § Patara, a city on the seacoast of Lycia, in Asia Minor, Acts 21:1*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
帕大喇 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "散落, 咒詛"
里西亞地靠海的城市, 因阿波羅(太陽神)神殿而著名 (徒 21:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
帕大喇 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "散落, 咒诅"
里西亚地靠海的城市, 因阿波罗(太阳神)神殿而著名 (徒 21:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ba-ta-ra; Pa-ta-ram, «tán xạ, lời rủa» một thành.
